meanings.definition: To decorate or adorn with jewels.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys jeweling her dresses for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The queen was jeweling her crown with precious gems.
meanings.sent3: The little girl was jeweling her doll's dress with shiny beads.
meanings.sent4: The artist was jeweling the painting with colorful rhinestones.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler was carefully jeweling the necklace with diamonds.

meanings.definition: The act of adding jewels or gemstones to an object.
meanings.sent1: The jeweling of the tiara made it sparkle beautifully.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate jeweling on the antique bracelet.
meanings.sent3: The jeweling on the sword made it look like a royal weapon.
meanings.sent4: The jeweling on the crown added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The jeweling on the dress caught the light and shimmered.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a jeweled design.
meanings.sent1: The jeweling of the ring required great skill and precision.
meanings.sent2: The jeweling of the necklace was a time-consuming task.
meanings.sent3: The jeweling of the shoes turned them into glamorous accessories.
meanings.sent4: The jeweling of the gown transformed it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The jeweling of the vase made it a stunning centerpiece.
